title: Where is BTS right now? - Quora

response.answer_text: they didn’t want me to tell you this- but i think i don’t have a heart to not tell u this. BTS is actually at my house. So that you understand it, i’ll just tell you what they’re doing rn. Jungkook is sobbing and lying against the wall drinking giant last banana milk. We speculated what could be the reason and realized that he could actually be on his period. Jin won’t stop from telling us all his mind blessings dad jokes he knows- and with all i mean all. omg, it’s becoming so annoying. even Jimin stopped to laugh. Yoongs went to a hotel a few kilometers away so he won’t be able to have a incredibly annoying Suckjin with a incredibly breath taking windshield laugh. Just imagine how much he actually had to piss him off to move Yoongi from his spot. He probably will be taking a “nap” for the next 52 hours. I hope i’ll get to see him again. Taehyung just decided to hug us all from behind because he wanted, so sweet. Now, he’s crying over some random Yeontan pictures he took. He said he dedicates now Winter Bear to him, when he actually said that that song was for me. So so so mean 😤 i think he would turn gay for this dog, if he actually isn’t yet. Hobi… i’m somehow relieved that he also got annoyed by Jin. He won’t speak (scream) in a incredibly volume anymore because he is so sick of the non stopping wild shield laugh. Believe me or not Armys, Jin can suck. Anyways, he’s listening to some Hip Hop band and just dizzing off, i think, what is a very rare view to observe, since he is the energy fullest man in the universe. Forgot to mention that. Yoongi said something to Jin that none of us did hear, but it was something that apparently scared him as fuck, so he stopped with his kill attempts. I’m grateful, but also worried if he blackmailed him. And worried why he still went to that hotel instead of just saying at the dorm, when it was finally quiet. Joonie is sharing with Sunshine headphones. What should I say more. Probably thinking of math terms or why Jungkook choosed socks with red circles and blue background instead of these with the blue circles and red background. At last but not least, Chimchim. We’re a happy couple since about one month. That crackhead thought his contract said that he isn’t allowed to date. He is and as good as always was, not including the three years after debut. Bangpd only said that he doesn’t recommend it since as good as anybody knows him. He didn’t know the contract he signed in, but when you think about it, it’s not very surprising, since he also forgot his lyrics two hours before performing. Anyways, we’re lying on the floor and my head on his chest. I love love love this position, you have the most beautiful and cute view from here. And I’m also happy that I was able to date him and he to love me back, even if he knew my love for him wasn’t ever real and I was just a psycho saesang fan and only was a fan girl, he still felt loved somehow. So you have of course a chance to date one of them. I just asked them and they’re all fine with it. Ah, you could go to the hotel were Yoongi’s. It’s in the fuckery avenue 285 A, South Korea, Busan. He is right now there, but I dunno if he will stay there, so hurry. Hope I could help you 😊💕(to realize where the limits of being an Army are.)

Bts is now having a break in South Korea although fans have spotted some members outside the states Jimin was in France. And was also in Alec Benjamin's concert  And Jin and yoongi were fishing  Rm uploaded pictures of him in a korean art museum the members still upload often about their dailies but I just hope they are okay and that saesang fans don’t follow them. JUST LET THEM LIVE LIKE NORMAL PEOPLE FOR A WEEK. THOSE POOR GUYS (I’m crying rn) SOME ARMIES ARE MAD BECAUSE JIMIN WAS IN A RESTAURANT DRINKING…HE IS 24(25) HE IS NOT A KID. AND WHAT IF THEY GOT TATTOOS. THEY ARE PEOPLE LIKE US. DON'T EXPECT THEM TO BE PERFECT. BECAUSE NO ONE IS. sorry i had a mental breakdown

upvoters.user_id: Supdt. Of Post Offices Medak Division
